title.rendered: Pompeii Trailer: Kit Harrington’s Abs Vs. The Volcano

content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

Everyone’s favorite not-a-virgin is making his way to the big screen. Kit Harrington, most famously known as Jon Snow from Game of Thrones, stars in the upcoming Pompeii. 

A teaser was released for the new film and despite it showing almost nothing plot wise, we do get a nice look at Harrington… and his abs.

Check out the Pompeii trailer below!

Along with Harrington, the film stars Emily Browning, Kiefer Sutherland, and Jared Harris. Pompeii was directed by Paul W.S. Anderson (Mr. Milla Jovovich) and is scheduled to hit theaters on February 21st.
